title: Panda Internet Security

Join and Win one of the 100 yearly Licenses for Panda Internet Security (for 3 devices)! 
Don’t get hacked. Protect you PC and your identity with Panda Internet Security Antivirus + Firewall: Forget about any kind of malware, for ever. Parental Control: Monitor your children’s online activity File Encryption: Safeguard your important files against ransomware. Safe Banking & Shopping: Prevent your credit cards and bank accounts to get stolen from hackers. Wi-Fi Protection: for private and public networks. And more… 
Please note: the licenses are valid for 1 year and can be activated on 3 devices including iOS, Android, Windows and Mac System Requirements: 
Android 4 or later/ iOS 7 or later/ Mac OS X 10.8 or later/ Windows XP (32 bits) or Windows Vista/ 7/ 8/ 8.1/ 10 (32 & 64 bits); For Windows: Processor: Pentium 300 MHz or faster; RAM: 256 MB; 240 MB free space; Browser: MS Internet Explorer 6.0 or higher; For Mac: Processor Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or higher; 200 MB free space; Internet connection Publisher:
